text: nævatat musa (tama janatavata) “oba lovehi æti janatava siyallanma (deviyanta sampurnayenma) venaskam kala vuvada, (ohuta kisima paduvak æti vanne næta). mandayat niyata vasayenma allah (kisivekuge udavvak) avasya novanneku vasayen ha prasamsavata himi keneku vasayen sitinneya” yayida pævasuveya
